title: Erigon node stopped syncing (Gnosis, Mainnet)
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `v2.48.1`

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Linux

Commit hash: 
4c461ac8f76cf2baaf1ca08c728f0ba448f6c2c6

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
`"--chain","gnosis",
"--datadir","/path/to/datadir",
"--private.api.addr","0.0.0.0:9090",
"--prune","htcr",
"--http.addr","0.0.0.0",
"--authrpc.addr","0.0.0.0",
"--authrpc.vhosts","*",
"--authrpc.jwtsecret","<jwt_token>",
"--http.vhosts","*",
"--http.corsdomain","*",
"--http.api","eth,net,web3,admin,trace,debug",
"--pprof","--pprof.addr=0.0.0.0",
"--metrics",
"--metrics.addr","0.0.0.0",
"--metrics.port","<metrics port>",
"--ws",
"--log.console.verbosity",4,
"--staticpeers","enode://..."`
          
Concensus Layer:
Lighthouse v4.2.0

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):
`"lighthouse","beacon_node",
"--datadir","/path/to/datadir",
"--network","gnosis",
"--port","<port>",
"--discovery-port","<port>",
"--eth1","--merge",
"--disable-enr-auto-update",
"--http",
"--http-address","0.0.0.0",
"--http-port","<port>",
"--metrics",
"--metrics-address","0.0.0.0",
"--metrics-port","<port>",
"--metrics-allow-origin","*",
"--listen-address","0.0.0.0",
"--target-peers","200",
"--disable-packet-filter",
"--execution-endpoints","http:/erigon_node:port",
"--execution-jwt","<jwt_token>"`

Chain/Network: 
Gnosis, Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour
The node is syncing

#### Actual behaviour
The node stopped syncing on block 26499999

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
1. Sync the node from scratch on Gnosis chain (mainnet)

Please note, for now we are starting to sync two more nodes from scratch to see if the issue is persistent
Meanwhile we are not going to stop the node that got stuck, feel free to ping me for a debug session if needed
